backend/main.mo: Defines challenge, recording, chat, and user profile types, initializes access control and storage, and maintains maps for challenges, participants, and assignments.

frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of multiple frontend source files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Thin import wrapper forwarding to the main stylesheet under src/index.css.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file setting meta tags, cache‑busting headers, and loading the main React bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application logic handling auth flow, screen routing, URL state sync, update checks, and challenge deletion notices.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Layout wrapper providing centered mobile container and suppressing the migration banner.
frontend/src/components/AppUpdatingNotic: Fullscreen notice shown during version‑mismatch auto‑refresh with loading indicator.
frontend/src/components/AssignmentDetail: Renders assignment text with bolded step headings while preserving line breaks.
frontend/src/components/AudioRecorder.ts: Audio recording UI handling record, review, save, delete, share confirmation, upload state, and error messaging.
frontend/src/components/AuthButton.tsx: Authentication button managing II login/logout states with translated labels and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/AuthIconButton.t: Icon-only login/logout button handling Internet Identity auth and cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/AutoInvitationRe: Automatically redeems stored invitation codes and displays loading or error states before rendering children.
frontend/src/components/ChallengeChatTab: Challenge chat UI with message sending, editing, replying, and auto-scrolling tied to active challenge state.
frontend/src/components/ChallengeDeleted: Popup dialog notifying users a challenge was deleted with scrollable content and dismiss action.
frontend/src/components/ChatReplyReferen: Shows a referenced message preview in replies, resolving sender names from cached or fetched data.
frontend/src/components/DevPanel.tsx: Optional developer panel showing auth info and providing state refresh tools.
frontend/src/components/InfoPopups.tsx: Renders buttons that open informational popups with translated sectioned content.
frontend/src/components/PopupBodySection: Renders popup sections with headings and text, preserving formatting and spacing.
frontend/src/components/ProfileCompletio: Blocks app until user completes profile name, providing a form and handling profile mutations.
frontend/src/components/QueryStateGate.t: Wrapper component that handles loading, error, and success states for a query before rendering children.
frontend/src/components/RecordingLevelMe: Displays a color-coded audio level bar based on a normalized input value.
Audio player component with play/pause, seek slider, and time display using an HTMLAudioElement.
frontend/src/components/RecordingWavefor: Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/SharedPopup.tsx: Wrapper around shadcn Dialog providing consistent popup layout, scrolling, and trigger handling.
frontend/src/components/ThemeToggle.tsx: Button that switches between light and dark themes using the useTheme hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAppUpdateGuard.ts: Checks app version on startup and triggers a one-time hard refresh if outdated, with loop protection.
frontend/src/hooks/useAudioRecording.ts: Hook for recording microphone audio with live level analysis, managing blobs, timers, and cleanup.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthPrincipal.ts: Returns authentication status and principal string based on Internet Identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, stored identity loading, and AuthClient setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query wrappers for backend calls, standardized query keys, and assignment ID retry logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useSuppressMigrationB: React hook that scans and observes DOM mutations to hide unwanted migration banners by matching text content.
frontend/src/hooks/useTheme.ts: Hook that manages light/dark theme based on localStorage or system preference and toggles the document class.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserChallengeStatu: Fetches the user's challenge status using React Query when authenticated and an actor is available.
frontend/src/i18n/i18n.ts: Empty placeholder file for i18n setup.
frontend/src/i18n/I18nContext.tsx: Provides a translation context using English strings and a nested key lookup helper.
frontend/src/i18n/index.ts: Empty index file for i18n exports.
frontend/src/i18n/translations.ts: Defines the English translation dictionary for multiple app screens and UI strings.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining CSS variables, dark mode values, and base styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point that initializes React Query, Internet Identity, global styles, and mounts the app.
UI placeholder for the no-active-challenge screen with state refresh, navigation, and translated text.
Large placeholder for creating or managing a challenge, including dates, codes, participants, and mutations.
frontend/src/screens/Screen5ManageChalle: Empty placeholder for managing a challenge.
Placeholder for an active challenge screen showing status, actions, and translation-based text.
Main challenge screen handling day selection, participant views, audio recording upload/share/delete, and challenge state recovery. Integrates multiple queries, URL state, and UI components for the 7‑day challenge flow.
frontend/src/screens/UnifiedEntryMenu.ts: Entry menu deciding whether to log in, resume a challenge, or create one based on auth and user status. Renders hero layout, CTA button, and settings/auth controls.
frontend/src/utils/appUrlState.ts: Reads, writes, and clears screen/tab/day state in URL search params without affecting other parameters. Provides lightweight navigation state persistence.
frontend/src/utils/appVersion.ts: Gets the running app version from a meta tag and extracts versions from fetched HTML, filtering out placeholders. Used for deploy/version comparison.
frontend/src/utils/assignmentIdCompat.ts: Provides mapping and normalization between hyphenated and underscored assignment IDs with error parsing for invalid‑assignment backend responses. Supports compatibility retry logic.
frontend/src/utils/assignments.ts: Defines the fixed 5 daily assignments for the 7‑day challenge with canonical IDs and detailed text content. Ensures alignment with backend assignment identifiers.
frontend/src/utils/backendBuildInfo.ts: Caches backend build info in-memory and exposes getters, a short identifier generator, and a clear function. Helps diagnose frontend/backend mismatches.
frontend/src/utils/challengeContext.ts: Stores and retrieves the active challenge ID in sessionStorage for restoring context after refresh. Includes helpers to persist, get, and clear the ID.
frontend/src/utils/challengeDayFormat.ts: Formats challenge day headers using the start timestamp to compute weekday and date. Falls back gracefully when startTime is missing.
frontend/src/utils/challengeDeletedNotic: Persists a flag in sessionStorage indicating that a challenge was deleted and exposes helpers to set, read, and clear it.
frontend/src/utils/challengeRecovery.ts: Provides a full reset of all challenge-related client state by clearing stored IDs, URL state, and invalidating/removing React Query caches.
frontend/src/utils/hardRefresh.ts: Implements a cache‑busted hard refresh with loop protection and a helper to clear the protection flag.
frontend/src/utils/invitationCodes.ts: Generates random uppercase alphanumeric invitation codes using a restricted character set.
frontend/src/utils/invitationLinks.ts: Builds, parses, clears, and persists invitation link parameters while preserving navigation state.
frontend/src/utils/recordingDayIndex.ts: Converts between UI (1–7) and backend (0–6) day values with validation helpers.
Logs recording upload attempts, failures, and successes with minimal sanitized context and version info.
frontend/src/utils/recordingIds.ts: Normalizes recording day and assignment IDs, validates canonical assignment IDs, and provides related utilities.
Extracts and sanitizes error messages, mapping backend errors to safe, user‑friendly messages and providing error‑type checks.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Handles reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, supporting both query and hash‑based routing.
frontend/src/utils/versionCheck.ts: Implements version checking by comparing the running app version with a freshly fetched HTML version and returns structured results; includes a deprecated wrapper for legacy refresh checks.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, animations, container settings, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s state, including issues, feature requirements, and a pending fix request related to audio recording upload and share failures due to disallowed origin.
